DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety/tolerability pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics CKD-519
DOC.detailed_description: A Dose-block Randomized , Double-blind , Placebo-controlled , Multiple Dosing , Dose-escalation Phase I Clinical Trial Investigate Safety/Tolerability Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics CKD-519 After Oral Administration Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Between 19 age 55 age healthy adult 2 . Body weight 55kg male , 50kg female 3 . Body Mass Index 18.5 25 ( body mass index=kg/m2 ) 4 . If female , must include one among item The menopause ( natural menses least 2 year ) Surgical Infertility ( hysterectomy bilateral oophorectomy , tubal ligation method infertility condition 5 . If men sexual life woman childbearing age , Necessarily agree use condom sperm donation two month clinical trial final dosage investigational product 6 . Those fully understand clinical trial enough hearing , decide join clinical trial comply precaution write consent 1 . Have clinically significant disease hepatobiliary system ( severe hepatic impairment , etc ) , kidney ( severe renal impairment , etc ) , nervous system , immune system , respiratory system , endocrine system , hematooncology disease , cardiovascular system ( heart failure , etc ) mental illness , history mental disease . 2 . Have history Toresades de pointes ( TdP ) additional risk factor Toresades de pointes ( TdP ) . ( Family history long QT syndrome sudden death , heart failure , hypokalemia , etc ) 3 . Have gastrointestinal disease history effect drug absorption ( Crohn 's disease , ulcer , etc . ) surgery ( except simple appendectomy hernia surgery ) 4 . Hypersensitivity reaction clinically significant hypersensitivity reaction history drug additives . 5 . An impossible one participate clinical trial include screen test ( medical history taking , BP , 12lead ECG , physical examination , blood & urine laboratory test result ) 28 day take investigational Products . 6 . Defined follow laboratory parameter AST , ALT > 1.25 upper limit normal range Total bilirubin > 1.5 upper limit normal range CPK > 1.5 upper limit normal range eGFR ( use MDRD method ) < 60mL/min/1.73m2 7 . Defined follow 12lead ECG HR < 40 > 110bpm PR interval > 220ms â‰¤110ms QRS interval > 120ms QTcF < 300ms > 450ms Pathologic Qwaves ( define > 40ms depth > 0.5mV ) Incomplete complete bundle branch block Preexcitation ( e.g. , WolfeParkinsonWhite Syndrome ) Atrial fibrillation/flutter Second thirddegree atrioventricular ( AV ) block Investigator judge unfavorable consistently accurate QT measurement ( e.g. , indistinct QRS onset , low amplitude T wave , invert terminally inverted T wave , merge T/U wave , indistinct T wave offset , prominent U wave affect QT measurement ) 8 . Sitting SBP > 150mmHg < 90mmHg , sit DBP > 100mmHg < 50mmHg , 5 minute break . 9 . Drug abuse history drug abuse showes positive urine drug test . 10 . Pregnant lactating woman . 11 . A heavy caffeine consumer ( caffeine > 5 cups/day ) , alcohol consumer ( alcohol > 210g/week ) , smoker ( cigarette > 10 cigarettes/day ) 12 . Subject take ethical drug herbal medicine within 14 day , OTC within 7 day begin study treatment investigator determine take drug affect study could affect safety subject . 13 . Subject take inhibitor inducer drug metabolize enzyme ( Barbiturates etc . ) within 30 day . 14 . Taking concomitant medication prolong QT/QTc interval within 14 day begin study treatment . 15 . Taking food contain grapefruit within 7 day begin study treatment ( ex . Drinking contain grapefruit 1L per day within 7 day begin study treatment ) 16 . Subject treat investigational drug within 90 day begin study treatment 17 . Previously donate whole blood within 60 day component blood within 30 day . 18 . An impossible one participant clinical trial investigator 's decision include laboratory test result another reason . 19 . Positive Serology test ( Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , HIV )
